Inspired by Software Carpentry this session is designed to help new programmers and coders to become more familiar with version control using git. Using version control can help you collaborate, better track your work, and greatly facilitates documenting your work.

If you’ve ever wanted to start using version control. This workshop is for you!

Register! Space is limited.

Time: 1-4 Location: CAS 132

After the session, we’ll head to the BU Pub for a “Hacky Hour.”
